arts.ttl: Stuttgart crush Young Boys to boost knockout qualification hopes
arts.sum: Chris Fuhrich scores the pick of the goals as Stuttgart boost their knockout qualification hopes with a resounding 5-1 win over Swiss side Young Boys on matchday six of the UEFA Champions League group phase.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart European dream lives following historic performance
arts.sum: Three German internationals and one heavily capped German youth international were able to commemorate their first Champions' League goals on Wednesday night, in the process helping their German club team keep their European dream alive.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Stuttgart vs. Young Boys Bern
arts.sum: The team sheets for this evening's Champions' League duel between VfB Stuttgart and Young Boys Bern are in.
Germany's preeminent footballing publication reports that Stuttgart are eyeing up Nürnberg striker Stefanos Tzimas ahead of the coming January transfer window.

arts.ttl: Angelo Stiller could look for a pay rise at VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Sport Bild reports that Angelo Stiller could look for a pay rise at VfB Stuttgart after recently switching his agent, which is something that the bosses at the MHP Arena also…

arts.ttl: Rieder wants permanent move to Stuttgart
arts.sum: Fabian Rieder hopes that Stuttgart will make his loan move permanent.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart view Paul Wanner as a potential replacement for Enzo Millot as Borussia Dortmund show interest in the Frenchman
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that VfB Stuttgart are preparing for the potential departure of Enzo Millot in the summer and see Paul Wanner as an option. Millot has a release clause valued…

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Young Boys: UEFA Champions League probable teams, match stats and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart will hope to build on some encouraging domestic results when they host Switzerland's Young Boys in the UEFA Champions League on Wednesday (kick-off: 9pm CET). VfB have won seven of their eight European games against teams from Switzerland to date, only losing away to Young Boys in the 2010/11 Europa League.

arts.ttl: Report: Dortmund join race for Millot, Stuttgart eye Wanner as replacement
arts.sum: According to Sky Germany, Borussia Dortmund have joined the race for Enzo Millot, while VfB Stuttgart are considering Bayern Munich youngster Paul Wanner as a possible replacement.
